channel.title: [Suggestion] Base Put On Topics [Suggestion]
channel.description:
Note: I do not know the official place for putting suggestions. Correct me please.
Ok, I really hope this suggestion goes through. It will help alot of people on this forum.
My suggestion: When making a topic in "Server Help", "Client Help", etc, there should be a place under the "Subject" box. It should be "Base:". I am tired of people just putting "HELP!" as a topic, not putting if it is Delta, Project Insanity, Hyperion, etc. The base would be posted next to the subject in smaller letters. This could also go with server versions. Examples: 317, 474, 508, 525, 562, etc.

item.title: [Suggestion] Base Put On Topics [Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

the problem with the whole “base” idea is that virtually all the server are exactly the same. no such thing as a delta or a project insanity they are all just winterlove clones. as for the versioning. Unless its directly relating to a packet it should not be version specific. It should also be up the reader to distinguish if they can or cannot use a tutorial. if a tutorial calls a bunch of methods you don’t have chances are you can’t use it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Base Put On Topics [Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

usman555:

If everyone just follows this condition, then we won’t need to beg & bother our staff members to do this.

I personally always do this. 90% of people do not.

Read full topic
